title: The Fed, Markets, And Cybersecurity (Podcast)
itunes:title: The Fed, Markets, And Cybersecurity (Podcast)
description:
Steve Matthews, US Economy with Bloomberg News, discusses the Fed shrinking its balance sheet today, the release of Beige Book, and Janet Yellen saying the administration got inflation wrong. Jess Menton, equities reporter with Bloomberg News, discusses the S&P starting June where it began in May and volatility in the markets. David Katz, President and CIO of Matrix Asset Advisors, talks about the markets and where you should put your money in 2022. Fran Rosch, CEO of ForgeRock (NYSE: FORG), discusses his company's performance and software development. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
